name: Chubu
description:
Game Info Chubu is the name of the pink square character and you are trying to solve platforming puzzles.

This is a just demo for game mechanics in my mind. 

It just 5 levels for now. 

I'm planning to do 5 chapters and 20 levels for each chapter.

Chubu is my first trying the game making. If you like it comment it that for develop this game.
